title: PLAT MID/ADC DUO LOOKING FOR 3.
body:
My mate and I are looking to make a team/join a team. We can play all roles but would rather 3 members to main JG/Top/Supp. We have teamspeak/curse/skype. Easy going and aren't toxic and would prefer if you were the same. Cheers all

Enjoy your night. :)

IGN: Slayer 1
